txt.en: Meriona confirmed that the necklace belongs to Riderch.\n\nHe rests at Stonecrop Encampment, to the south-west of Nímbarth.
To whom does this necklace belong?

'My necklace! I didn't think I'd see it again. To tell the truth, the loss of my necklace pained me more than my actual injuries. It's all I have left of Dunland.\n\n'Perhaps I'll return home one day. I hope so.'

This necklace, which you found on a defeated half-orc, must have been taken as a trophy from someone recently. The materials that were used to craft the necklace are clearly not local.\n\nTo your knowledge, the only people who have come to Nímbarth are Meriona and her scouts, who keep watch outside the ruins. It might be worth asking her if she recognizes the necklace.
You have found a necklace on a defeated half-orc in Nímbarth.\n\nYou should find Meriona outside of Nímbarth and ask her if she recognizes the necklace.

'This necklace... yes, I know who its owner is. The half-orcs must have taken it off of Riderch when they captured him. If you'd like to return it to him, he should still be resting at the camp near Tharbad, south-west of here.'
